casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Edward GOSS. No. 316A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of November 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time for Court Reporter to Deliver Transcripts:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 10th day of January 2006 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
